Web Monkey n'at
About Archive Demos Research Portfolio Music

Hello, my name is Joel Kirchartz. I like to make stuff and share it with people on the web.

I'm a web developer living in Pittsburgh, Pa. I also enjoy making art, music, and electronics and practicing various circus skills & feats of prestiditation. Learning new things is fun.

I've spent most of my time developing solutions for small businesses and startups, most recently for Songwhale and Skyword. I'm a self-taught polyglot programmer, I've worked with PHP, Python, Coldfusion, Java, Javascript, Actionscript, Shell scripting, HTML and CSS. My favorite text editor is vim, if you're interested in how my rig is setup check out my dotfiles.

I have a wonderful family. My wife and son are the two most amazing people in my life, I don't know how I'd be able to do it all without their support.
